metadata.description: Creative skills for content creators — video production, visual storytelling, and social media exports

plugins.name: vinyl-reel
plugins.description: Creates polished 9:16 vinyl unboxing reels (YouTube Shorts & Instagram Reels) from raw footage and your own recorded voiceover

plugins.name: discography-reel
plugins.description: Creates a 9:16 discography reel showcasing a band's full studio discography from per-album video clips and audio samples
